content: {A喜欢}This one? Okie dokie! That way, the friends the meteor shower brings along with it will think our planet is all floofalicious and cozy, right?
info: 参加流星雨-绵朵_主流程文本3

content: Say, should I wear a floofalicious outfit too? Maybe, as we gaze at the sky, there are friends beyond the meteor shower who'll be watching on as well.
info: 参加流星雨-绵朵_主流程文本3

content: I heard that after a meteor shower, the sky becomes all fluffalicious and puffy... as if the meteors had woven it into a great, expansive blanket!
info: 参加流星雨-绵朵_主流程文本3

content: {A笑眯眯}Alrighty, I'll wear this one, staying nice and floofalicious for the meteor shower! By the way, I hid a plushie in my clothes too. Can you guess where?
